panels.title: GLOBAL WORKER WATTS (28W SOFT CAP PER NODE)

targets.expr: 100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="master", job="node-exporter", device="/dev/nvme0n1p2", mountpoint="/"} * 100) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="master", job="node-exporter", device="/dev/nvme0n1p2", mountpoint="/"})
